definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Every country must obey international laws in this world.
sentences.chinese: 世界上的每个国家都应遵守国际公法。

sentences.english: Principle of proportion is an important principle in the field of public law of modern world nations.
sentences.chinese: 比例原则是近现代世界各国公法领域的一项重要原则。

sentences.english: Public Law generated in China with accompanied by the formation of the Community.
sentences.chinese: 公法在中国是伴随着共同体的形成而生成的。

sentences.english: The mainland legal system has division public law and the civil law.
sentences.chinese: 大陆法系有公法与私法之分。

sentences.english: What is the difference between a public and private law?
sentences.chinese: 料。这些是公法还是私法呢？

sentences.english: Finally, the part discusses the effectiveness arrangement of the tax priority and other creditor's rights in public law.
sentences.chinese: 论述了税收优先权与其他公法债权的效力序位。

sentences.english: Public and private laws are contained in separate volumes.
sentences.chinese: 公法和私法被分卷收编。

sentences.english: American leaders not only acknowledged the law of nations, but took its directions seriously.
sentences.chinese: 美国领导人们不但承认，而且认真遵循万国公法。

sentences.english: The Congress shall have Power to define and punish Offences against the Law of Nations.
sentences.chinese: 国会应有权力界定及惩罚违反万国公法。
